item.title: About PrimerPy
item.author: isaaczhou85@gmail.com (Isaac Zhou)
item.description: PrimerPy Primerpy provides a primer on python and related data science topics. It covers all the prerequisites for Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence. It is designated for tech stacks and programming languages used in data science. So what are those? Python Python is a clear winner in data science. We cover not only the native Python features, such as loops, functions and objects, but also important libraries such as Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Bokeh, scikit-learn, statsmodels and sqlalchemy etc.
